=======
Facades
=======

.. class:: yepes.contrib.datamigrations.facades.MultipleExportFacade

    **Ancestors (MRO)**

    This class does not inherit methods and attributes from any classes.

    **Methods**

    .. method:: to_directory(dir, **options)
    .. method:: to_file(file, **options)
    .. method:: to_file_path(file_path, **options)

.. class:: yepes.contrib.datamigrations.facades.MultipleImportFacade

    **Ancestors (MRO)**

    This class does not inherit methods and attributes from any classes.

    **Methods**

    .. method:: from_directory(dir, **options)
    .. method:: from_file(file, **options)
    .. method:: from_file_path(file_path, **options)
